profileAlternative.name: Alvira Swalin
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist @ Uber
profileAlternative.summary:
IIT Bombay graduate (2016) and MSDS alum at USF. Keen to apply Mathematical, Statistical and Machine Learning experience to solve complicated data science problems and utilize strong programming proficiency. I am an active blogger & kaggler.
Check out my blogs here - https://medium.com/@aswalin
Kaggle Profile - https://www.kaggle.com/alvira12

aboutAlternative.text:
IIT Bombay graduate (2016) and MSDS alum at USF. Keen to apply Mathematical, Statistical and Machine Learning experience to solve complicated data science problems and utilize strong programming proficiency. I am an active blogger & kaggler.
Check out my blogs here - https://medium.com/@aswalin
Kaggle Profile - https://www.kaggle.com/alvira12

given.text: I highly recommend Alvira! She is bright, easy to work with and likable, and she did great work for us. Alvira helped us push the envelope on our machine learning driven recommendation approach. She brought new thinking and techniques to the table and operated with little guidance and in an environment with a lot of ambiguity. She is focused and worked hard to try out different models and methods until we found one that worked well and got good results. See less

items: Sentiment Analysis of Yelp Restaurant's Reviews
Capacitated Vehicle Routing Problem (Traveling Salesman Problem)
Soil Biotechnology - Industrial Collaborator: Dr. Biplank Patanaik
